title: Claimants
name: Cordelia & Cassius Luthvain
summary: The Claimants, are a pair of ambitious siblings seeking to reclaim their lost lineage in a distant land. Adept in both combat and sorcery, they combine their varied skills to support allies and vanquish foes. Their unique tactics allow them to act as both a single unit and individuals, making them unpredictable and versatile on the battlefield.
history: Driven from their ancestral home in a far-off land, the Claimants have journeyed to the Ancestor's estate seeking forbidden knowledge and eldritch secrets. Their ultimate goal is to amass enough power and uncover crucial information that will enable them to reclaim their own lost birthright and restore their family's glory in their homeland. The mysteries left behind by the Ancestor are but stepping stones in their ambitious quest.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Striking blue eyes, bold red lips/Full well-groomed beard

notes: Act as both a single unit and as individuals in combat
Can combine varied skill sets in the same turn
